title: 820-3437 SMC on 00165?
message:
Hi.

I need an SMC for the 820-00165 but I don't have one.
I've looked at the pinout for the SMC from the 820-3437 and the 820-00165 and it looks to be all the same so I recon it should work but does anyone know for sure?

title: 820-3437 SMC on 00165?
message: No idea, only 1 way to find out. It could create other issues with software and updates that look at SMC software version.

title: 820-3437 SMC on 00165?
message: Heh...... It's running ASD. Machine thinks it's a 2013 (kinda cute). Boot ROM headers F* and fan is spinning on high so I will call that a fail and source an 820-00165 to swipe from.

title: 820-3437 SMC on 00165?
message: Anyone know how this 2015 machine is running ASD 3S162 EFI?

title: 820-3437 SMC on 00165?
message: It shouldn't unless the ROM was messed with, or ROM for 13" retina is the same as the air.
